title: Book your practical driving or riding test

details.description: Book your practical driving or riding test from £62 using the only official driving test booking service - book online or by phone or post, includes ADI tests 2 and 3
details.alternative_title: Book your official Driving Standards Agency (DSA) practical driving or riding test
details.more_information:
Booking

You’ll need your:

  • Great Britain or Northern Ireland driving licence number
  • theory test pass certificate number and date you passed (if needed)
  • credit or debit card - find out how much it costs

You can find your theory test pass certificate number online if you’ve lost your original letter.

If you’re taking a car test and have your driving instructor’s personal reference number you can use this to check they’re available, but can book your test without doing this.

Practical tests

You can book the following practical tests online:

  • car
  • moped and motorcycle
  • lorry and large vehicle
  • car and large trailer
  • bus and coach
  • taxi
  • specialist vehicles, like tractor, road roller and tracked vehicle
  • approved driving instructor (ADI) driving ability - part 2
  • ADI instructional ability - part 3

Help with your booking

Call DSA if you have any problems booking your driving test online.

DSA booking support
Telephone: 0300 200 11 22
Textphone: 0300 200 11 44
Monday to Friday, 8am to 4pm

Data protection

You can read the Data Protection Act 1998 fair processing notice for the Driving Standards Agency (DSA) before you start.
details.introduction:
Book your official practical driving or riding test - you’ll need to have passed your theory test. You can book online between 6am and 11:40pm.

This page is also available in Welsh (Cymraeg).

tags.title: Driving tests, motorcycle tests and learning to drive

details.description: Booking a test, changing and cancelling tests, rules and fees, compulsory basic training

Book your driving test or get a tax disc online, find out the legal requirements for buying, owning, importing or scrapping a car or motorcycle, and read about your rights and responsibilities as a driver.
